Uses of Interface
api.game_service

Packages that use game_service 
Package Description
gameClient  

  • Uses of game_service in gameClient

    Methods in gameClient with parameters of type game_service 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void Ex2_Client.init​(game_service game)  
    private static void Ex2.initGame​(game_service game)
    This method initializes the game, it retrieves the pokemons and the game graph from the JSON file, then updates the graph, the pokemons and the agents to the game.
    private static void Ex2.insertAgents​(game_service game, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
    This method inserts agents from the JSON into the graph.
    private static void Ex2_Client.moveAgants​(game_service game, directed_weighted_graph gg)
    Moves each of the agents along the edge, in case the agent is on a node the next destination (next edge) is chosen (randomly).
    static void Ex2.moveAgents​(game_service game, directed_weighted_graph gameGraph)
    This method move the agents in the graph of the game to capture the pokemons.
